about_the_game:
This adventure mode expansion features new heroes, events, levels, bosses and items available in singleplayer adventure.

“An army marches on its stomach,
It is crucial to get our stomach filled up before we start our adventure…
…but Yuyuko's stomach is bottomless! We have run out of food even before we made our first step!”

“This should not happen!
Now our adventure begins anew with one purpose:
FIND ENOUGH FOOD TO FEED YUYUKO.”

“This new journey is tougher than our previous ones, but it also promises excitement, because you will never know what you will find to stuff into your mouth!”

“My tummy is yelling! Can you spare that bit of food you just picked up to me? I will test if it is poisonous~”
“No way!”

NEW HEROES: 4 new playable characters available for Adventure mode!
NEW CHALLENGES: 46 new levels and 21 new bosses, each with normal and EX difficulty variants!
NEW EVENTS: 16 new random events, with 4 new boss events!
NEW ITEMS: 70 new ITEMS!
NEW PROFILE IMAGE: 1 new Adventure Mode exclusive profile image!
detailed_description:
This adventure mode expansion features new heroes, events, levels, bosses and items available in singleplayer adventure.

“An army marches on its stomach,
It is crucial to get our stomach filled up before we start our adventure…
…but Yuyuko's stomach is bottomless! We have run out of food even before we made our first step!”

“This should not happen!
Now our adventure begins anew with one purpose:
FIND ENOUGH FOOD TO FEED YUYUKO.”

“This new journey is tougher than our previous ones, but it also promises excitement, because you will never know what you will find to stuff into your mouth!”

“My tummy is yelling! Can you spare that bit of food you just picked up to me? I will test if it is poisonous~”
“No way!”

NEW HEROES: 4 new playable characters available for Adventure mode!
NEW CHALLENGES: 46 new levels and 21 new bosses, each with normal and EX difficulty variants!
NEW EVENTS: 16 new random events, with 4 new boss events!
NEW ITEMS: 70 new ITEMS!
NEW PROFILE IMAGE: 1 new Adventure Mode exclusive profile image!
